review: The first two we received were defective, each time we wanted to use them we had to open the back and take the battery out and put it back in, quite inconvenient.  After spending way too much time with Roku on the phone it was determined that they were faulty and they should be replaced, which meant we had to go to Amazon (the seller).  Amazon was great within 5 minutes they said that they would send out replacements within 2 days.  They arrived as promised.............however, it wasn't just the remotes it was the entire package.In order to use the new remotes we had to undo the first remotes and reinstall the second.  This took 1 hour and 36 minutes.  The technician was very patient and explained each and every step.  When he and my husband were done he thanked us and my husband said, hold it, we have another remote with the same problem and so they were able to go through the process more quickly than the first.So far the new remotes work well (we did have to remove one battery once).We are really enjoying Net Flix so I guess it was worth the many hours spent correcting the problem.
